page.title: 06LEISURE IN COOKLEY
page.content: Apart from the current home entertainments like videos and computers, leisure activities in Cookley are limited. There are sporting facilities such as the tennis courts,the bowling green, the football and cricket pitches but one needs to be a member of the club inorder to enjoy them. There are local clubs such as the Amateur Dramatic Society (C.A.D.S.)! and the Footpath Society which are very good but again have limited membership. Most of the yongsters in the village tend to drift off into { {Kidderminster}to seek entertainment or else drift listlessly about.
